reviews.text: William and Karen came by on short noticed to do our move in deep cleaning and we appreciate them so much for making sure we move into a clean, sanitized throughly dust free home. I will be setting up a once of month schedule with them from now on

Santos Cleaning was amazing in a pinch. My father passed away last Monday and I had reached out to another cleaning company which fell through twice to clean my Mom's house. I reached out to Santos Friday morning and they had Karen come out the same afternoon. She did a fantastic job. Karen was thorough and meticulous and extremely nice. They were very understanding of my situation and incredibly professional. I would hire them again and again, especially if they could come to McDonough. ðŸ™‚ Thank you so much from the bottom of my heart. You shed a big light on a dark situation and I cant thank you and your team enough.

I was trying to book a move out clean within a weeks notice. SCS was quick to respond with a reasonable rate. All around great communication and excellent service. Will definitely book again if needed.

I am completely satisfied with the weekly cleaning.  They are always on time and pleasant.    If I need any particular thing cleaned in detail they make sure to follow through.  I highly recommend Santos Cleaning Solutions and think youâ€™ll be pleased!

Moved to a new area and just didnâ€™t know who to trust to clean the house we now love. We wanted it done right especially taking a chance with picking a company online. You just donâ€™t know what youâ€™re going to get. Well Santos Cleaning Solutions was the right choice. They were kind, professional, courteous and did a great job. They cleaned our home like it was their own. No need to look any further for a cleaning solution. Pick them now. Thanks Santos.

This was hands down the best deep cleaning service Iâ€™ve ever received. They were able to address all my concerns and also clean the high ceiling fixtures and windows for me!  They arrived at 10am and didn't finish until 4pm, needless to say, being thorough and ensuring I was a satisfied customer was a top priority for Santos Cleaning. My home sparkled and smelled so clean for days after the service, especially my bathrooms. I was so confident in their service, I ended up taking a nap while they cleaned the whole (felt good to rest knowing everything was being taken care of with great detail). I will be booking again and I  highly recommend booking them for deep cleaning and any regularly scheduled cleaning services you may need.
Karen and her team are great! They clean with great intention and are so flexible. I highly recommend!

The service I received was very unsatisfactory. I provided cleaning supplies such as leather cleaner, glass and wood cleaners, but they didn't use them as requested. The cleaning was not thorough and I was disappointed with the results.

Santos Cleaning Solutions is a wonderful company. Trust is a HUGE deal when allowing someone into your home. Not only do they do an amazing job EVERY time, but they are always in a good mood. We trust Santos Cleaning Solutions into our home even if we are not there.

His home needed a lot of attention, and their team stepped in with professionalism, care, and zero judgment. In addition, they were prompt for the first   appointment and understood exactly what was needed. I will be happy to use them again. If you are looking for a great cleaning service, I encourage you to try them!

It is always a pleasure having William and Karen over! They are truly hardworking professionals, who provide the best cleaning services, and go above and beyond every time. The experience is always seamless, and they pay attention to every detail. Communication with William and Karen has been excellent and reliable, and they are flexible with scheduling cleaning sessions. The results exceed my expectations, and I know my home is in good hands with them!
